titleNullable: Fish Head and Tail Detection Dataset
descriptionNullable:
# Description:

Welcome to the Fish Head and Tail Detection Dataset, a valuable resource for pioneering research and experimentation in fish head and tail detection, with a specific emphasis on identifying fish heads and tails. This dataset comprises a meticulously curated collection of 200 images, each richly annotated to facilitate advanced exploration.

# Dataset Overview:

* Total Images: 200
* Total Annotations: 1308
   * Fish Heads: 723
   * Fish Tails: 585

## Training Set:

* Images: 160
* Annotations: 1073
   * Fish Heads: 591
   * Fish Tails: 482

## Testing Set:

* Images: 40
* Annotations: 235
   * Fish Heads: 132
   * Fish Tails: 103

## Annotation Method:
All annotations in this dataset are meticulously generated using the Labeling for detection using YOLO technique, ensuring utmost precision and quality in the provided training data.

## File Information:

`train_images/`: A directory containing 160 training images.

`train_annotations.txt:` Annotations for the training images, including coordinates and labels for fish heads and tails.

`test_images/`: A directory containing 40 testing images.

`test_annotations.txt`: Annotations for the testing images, specifying the positions and categories of fish heads and tails.

# Categories:

Object Detection, Deep Learning

# Acknowledgment and Data Source:

Contributors:

Eko Prasetyo,Nanik Suciati,Chastine Fatichah

[Data Source](https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/7m2yzmpcft/1)

[View Details](https://plu.mx/plum/a?mendeley_data_id=7m2yzmpcft&theme=plum-bigben-theme)

[Image Source](https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fi.ytimg.com%2Fvi%2FTJN3gJoZqlY%2Fmaxresdefault.jpg&tbnid=K26SGqhpf6JvvM&vet=12ahUKEwj2uLn53PGAAxWUUt4KHSC7CqQQMygvegUIARDgAQ..i&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DTJN3gJoZqlY&docid=ETBNDMUJFOOM1M&w=1280&h=720&q=fish%20images&ved=2ahUKEwj2uLn53PGAAxWUUt4KHSC7CqQQMygvegUIARDgAQ)
